label: 加羅
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: The most important one of the several petty kingdoms that made up Imna (Mimana) in Korea. Also used for all of Imna, or all or Korea, or even all of China, being a general term for all the lands lying across the sea west of Japan. [任那]
